bibdata.title: IEEE Draft Standard for Rectangular Metallic Waveguides and Their Interfaces for Frequencies of 110 GHz and Above-- Part 2: Waveguide Interfaces
IEEE Draft Standard for Rectangular Metallic Waveguides and Their Interfaces for Frequencies of 110 GHz and Above-- Part 2: Waveguide Interfaces

organization.name: Institute of Electrical and Electronics Engineers

bibdata.abstract: This standard gives specifications for rectangular waveguide interfaces. It considers the tolerances of the waveguide interface dimensions and the effect these have on the electrical properties (in terms of reflection coefficient) of the waveguide

organization.name: Institute of Electrical and Electronics Engineers
